title: Automakers kick into high gear
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, April 2, 2013
contentencoded:
The "big three" automakers -- Chrysler, GM, and Ford -- are reporting sharp gains in sales for the month of March. Chrysler says the latest month was their best since 2007.

Juli Niemann, an analyst with Smith Moore & Company, joins Marketplace Morning Report host Jeremy Hobson to discuss the numbers and what's got customers buying again.
